title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 46.4 - Approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 46.4 - Approval

State Regulations

It is not necessary to submit samples of signs or flashing
red signal lamps to the commissioner for approval. Any such signs and signal
lamps may be used provided they conform to the size, type and specifications
contained in this Part. All signs and signal lamps which conform to the
foregoing rules, regulations and specifications, are hereby approved by the

Commissioner of Motor Vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
46.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
